dmca.title: Notice of Copyright Violation: ONE OF YOUR MEMBERS HAS STOLEN TWO OF MY WEBSITES AND
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

 

Please visit our web site at  <http://www.theplanet.com/legal>
www.theplanet.com/legal.

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


  _____  

From: ebay@westcoastwebsolutions.com [mailto:ebay@westcoastwebsolutions.com]

Sent: Thursday, December 29, 2005 11:35 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Notice of Copyright Violation: ONE OF YOUR MEMBERS HAS STOLEN TWO
OF MY WEBSITES AND RESELLING THEM ON EBAY.


Good Evening:  
 
I am having a problem that I just discovered with one of your customers,
www.HostsMaster.net, who is hosting two of my stolen websites.  He has them
identified by domain as www.seoinfoabout.com and www.theequityguide.com. 
 
I had a customer give me a heads up about another eBay seller who was
offering similar websites to ours. I investigated and have discovered that
somehow, he has gained access to the servers and stolen the source files for
two of my custom designed sites. I personally designed these websites and
know for a fact that they are exact duplicates (I have included some url's
of sites that we have done, and then the stolen site that your customer is
offering hereinbelow).  He is offering them on ebay.  Here is his
information I got from WhoIs. There is no other way he could have got this.
He has a hosting company called HostsMaster.net and the registered owner of
that domain name along with the two stolen website domain names is:

HostsMaster.net
Eric Aaron (sales@hostsmaster.net)
38,
Bayswater
London,SJ23W
GB
Tel. +44.164312933

I am not really sure how to stop this. This turd is in London and I am in
the US. I have reported this to eBay but want this guy to not be able to
access my server space. Can you tell me how this happened and what to do to
prevent it. Can you tell me when he accessed server. I am very concerned
about this and want to do something.

1. www.HitsASAP.com (My site) ALso, previous sites I did like this one
hits-alert.com, seo-tipster.com.. I could go on.
www.SEOINFOABOUT.COM (THIS IS THE STOLEN SITE HOSTED ON YOUR IP)

2. www.EquityABCs.com (My site) ALso, previous sites I did like this one
web-lender.com, equity-watch.com.. I could go on.
www.theequityguide.com (THIS IS THE STOLEN SITE HOSTED ON YOUR IP) 
 
If you have further questions, please feel free to use our Live Chat button
below or located on our company websites!
 
We look forward to serving all of your internet needs!  
Thank you for your business!!
P. Gomulka
President
 
West Coast Web Solutions ( <http://www.WestCoastWebSolutions.com>
www.WestCoastWebSolutions.com)
Hosting Hot Domains ( <http://www.HostingHotDomains.com>
www.HostingHotDomains.com)
Hot Domain Hosting ( <http://www.HotDomainHosting.com>
www.HotDomainHosting.com)

 <http://chat.boldchat.com/chat/visitor.jsp?cdid=3563359510> Live chat by
Boldchat
